text: Tangedco will stop power supply between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m. on January 11 (Monday) in the following places to take up maintenance work at the Kaduvettipalayam sub station: Kaduvettipalayam, Nallagoundanpalayam, Chandrapuram, Selamparayampalayam, Molakalipalayam, Valaiyapalayam (a part), Ganapathypalayam (a part), Moopiripalayam (a part), Vagarayampalayam (a part), Pappampatty (a part), Saliyur (a part), Karuvalur (a part) and Annur (a part).
title: Power shutdown
